title: 65th Independence Day Celebrations - 04th February 2013
decision_details:
the proposal made by Hon. W.D.J. Seneviratne, Minister of Public Administration and Home Affairs, to appoint a Ministerial Committee consisting of the following to make necessary arrangements for the 65th Independence Day Celebrations, was approved by the Cabinet:
Ministerial Committee 

		*	Hon. D.M. Jayaratne, 
			Prime Minister and Minister of Buddha Sasana 
			and Religious Affairs - (Chairman);

		*	Hon. W.D.J. Seneviratne,
			Minister of Public Administration and Home Affairs;

		*	Hon. Bandula Gunawardena,
			Minister of Education;

		*	Hon. Keheliya Rambukwella,
			Minister of Mass Media and Information;

		*	Hon. T.B. Ekanayaka,
			Minister of Culture and the Arts;

		*	Hon. Najeeb Abdul Majeed,
			Chief Minister,
			Eastern Province;

		*	Hon. M.K.A.D.S. Gunawardena,
			Deputy Minister of Buddha Sasana and Religious Affairs; and

		*	Hon. Wijaya Dahanayaka,
			Deputy Minister of Public Administration and Home Affairs.

	Secretary, Ministry of Public Administration and Home Affairs will function as the Secretary to this Committee.
